explanations.c: A lattice of N dimensions has N Miller indices

questions.question: With regard to Miller indices, which of these options are true?

answers.a: They are infinitely many planes possible for given Miller indices
answers.b: They are the magnitudes of the intercept made by the plane on the vectors

explanations.a: There is a family of planes possible for a given set of Miller indices

questions.question: For a cubic lattice, if the Miller index of a plane passing through the extremes of the three axes is [a,b,c], what is the value of a+b+c?

explanations.d: The Miller indice passing through extremes is [1,1,1] and hence 1+1+1=3

questions.question: For a cubic lattice, how many different sets of Miller indices exist such that there are atleast two zeroes in them?

explanations.a: There are 3 sets of miller indices which are [1,0,0], [0,1,0] and [0,0,1]
